mean_en: unable to think or act in a normal or logical way especially because of severe mental illness :crazy or insane
sentence: Don\u0027t listen to her--she\u0027s absolutely deranged. She\u0027s crazy!
sentence_trans: 别听她的。她绝对是精神错乱的疯子！
word_etyma: de相反 ＋ rang排列 ＋ ed形容词后缀 → 精神排列混乱 → deranged精神错乱的
